ing: 1 (4 serving size) package instant pistachio flavor pudding mix
1 (20 ounce) can DOLEÂ® Crushed Pineapple, undrained
des: "This dessert salad with a pistachio pudding base contains crushed pineapple, miniature marshmallows, pecans, and whipped topping."
ins:
Mix dry pudding mix, crushed pineapple, marshmallows and pecans in large bowl until well blended.  Gently stir in whipped topping; cover.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until ready to serve.
